dc_description_s: This shape file contains polygons indentifying the known oil and gas fields in Iraq. Information is contained which include the name of the fields, the type of hydrocarbon reserves, the estimated oil and gas reserves for the fields, the production status, the geological basin, the local terrain, the discovery basis, the discovery date, the discovery well, coordinates of a salient point in the field (often the discovery well), the reserves classification and the Barrels of Oil Equivalent (BOE) reserves of the field.
